chara.textHome: My favorite word is "laughter"!

My favorite activity is making people laugh!
My favorite thing is comedy,
and my hobby is watching stand-up!

So obviously, my dream career is...
to be a pro boxer!
Then I'd really knock 'em dead!
Yowza! Nah ha ha!
Here I am laughing at my own joke, yikes!
TPO just kills me!
Hm?
Oh, they're a comedy duo!

Well, they only just debuted,
so they're not a big name yet.

But they really know how to
bring down the house!

Yaaay!
I'm walking on air, with energy to spare!

Yup, yup, yup!
That's an upgrade for little ol' me!

If the old me hadn't been around...
this bright and shiny me wouldn't be either.

So, you know?
Hats off to the old me.

To change into someone that's always
bright and cheerful no matter what...

It was my decision to make that wish,
and nobody else's.

That's exactly why the me that wish created,
the way I am now, is 100% the real me.

Hiii! Hello, hello!
I'm full of energy and ready to go!

If you're feeling down, I'll share
some of my energy with you!

It's morning!
Let's get some exercise time in!

Commencing
"Gymnastics Work Out No. 5568!"
Wait, you do know that was a joke, right?
There can't possibly be that many!!!

I'm so hungry, my energy tank is empty, 
I'm running on fumes... The usual me is—

Waaait! Today's lunch is yakisoba?!
Yeah, babyyy! I love me some yakisoba!

Heyyy, you! Yeah, you!
Come shopping with me!

I know some good places! So good that
you'll be like, I wanna buy EVERYTHING!
I really like sleeping! LOVE IT!

In fact... It just feels so good
rolling around in bed!
Although I probably should just go to sleep!

Whenever I find something weirdly cute,
I can't help but buy it!
Not just like clothes, but knick-knacks, too!

I mean, look at my phone case.
It's got a fried shrimp on it!

Witches spread curses...
Wherever they gather, they bring darkness.
We've gotta get rid of them!

I don't like the Mirror Witch's Labyrinth.
There're mirrors everywhere you look,
which basically makes it a huge maze!

Well... All you can do is just try to keep
moving forward!

I like weird clothes! Things that make 
people ask, "Where'd you buy that?!"

The other day, I bought this t-shirt with
a TON of different sushi on it!
I love comedy.

I like skits, but my favorite style is
stand-up comedy.
I love how fast they talk!

I could seriously spend all day at a hardware
store! Don't you think they're like their own 
little theme parks?

I love looking at all the stuff.
It's like, "What would you even use this for?!"

I always wonder what it'd be like
to be on a comedy show.

It'd be so much fun to jump in with a zinger
like, "Orange you glad I didn't say orange?"

Comedians are amazing. They're all like,
"I'm gonna make you laugh,"

and then they do something that really
does make you laugh like crazy!
It's such a cool job!
I like orange!
I mean the color!
I like yellow too!

They both remind me of like, vitamins.
Gives me tons of energy!
You mean my friend from when I was little?
Yeah, she's a really special friend!
I don't really ever feel jealous...
I don't think that emotion really suits me!

The me that was laughing so much
just now...
The me that was so jealous of my friend...
They're both parts of my personality.
Th-this?!
This is...
my notebook for writing down jokes.
No, no, no!

I'm not trying to be a comedian
or anything, I just think of good
jokes and stuff sometimes…

No prob, no prob!
I can't prove it, but it's no prob!
Wooooo! I'm feeling so pumped!
Well, that went as expected!
It didn't work?! I thought it would, though!
We're on a roll! Let's do another!

Thank you everybody,
you're a great audience!
I'm Ayaka! That's Ayaka Mariko, everybody!

If you remember one thing today,
remember my name!

So long as I push myself forward with a
big ol' smile, there'll be a path I can take!

Whoa, are you mega, for reals,
super serious right now?!

I'm over the moon!
Marikongratulations! Ahaaa!
Yeah, yeah, yeah!
I'm super happy about this!
Whatcha think?
I'm smiling real wide, aren't I?

My fav host?
Probably Shimoda from Curry Casserole.

And I only just found out that the
comedy duo used to be called
a different name long ago.
I love the Marilin show!

It's a radio show this duo does, and I've
listened every single time since they started!
It's on late Saturday night, every week!
Tune in for the next one, 'kay?
